Paragraph.Text: The network teleporter is a version of the teleporter than allows a user to instantly teleport between any other network teleport placement. To use; supply the teleporter with sufficient power, stand on in, and press Interact (default 'E') or the Jump key (default 'Space'). A popup window will appear with a list of locations to available to be teleported to. The power required depends upon the distance teleported.

The location name can be changed by clicking on the name. The X/Z teleport exit facing direction can be changed by looking in the exit direction desired, interact to launch the popup, and click the Change Exit Direction button.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Max. Teleport Distance: Power Required: Power Capacity: Max. Power Recharge Rate:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: Unlimited 40 per meter Double Highest Cost Unlimited
